title: Meta adds parental controls for AI-teen interactions
description: Meta is adding parental controls for kids' interactions with artificial intelligence chatbots — including the ability to turn off one-on-one chats with AI characters altogether — beginning early next year.
content:
By BARBARA ORTUTAY, Associated Press
Meta is adding parental controls for kids’ interactions with artificial intelligence chatbots — including the ability to turn off one-on-one chats with AI characters altogether — beginning early next year.

title: AI tech takes on one of NSW's deadliest rock fishing spots
description: Surf Life Saving NSW is testing artificial intelligence cameras at Kiama Blowhole to detect when fishers are swept into the water and alert rescuers within seconds.
content:
One of the state's most dangerous rock fishing spots is the focus of a new Surf Life Saving NSW trial using artificial intelligence to help prevent drownings.
The 14-month project is underway at Kiama Blowhole, where powerful waves and unpredictable ... [1997 chars]
